original_text: Instead, learn to do what is right. Be honest and fair in what you do. Help people who are in pain. Make sure that widows and children who have no family receive justice.’
korean_text: 선행을 배우며 정의를 구하며 학대 받는 자를 도와 주며 고아를 위하여 신원하며 과부를 위하여 변호하라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: Instead, learn to do what is right.
sentences.korean_translation: 대신에 올바른 것을 하는 법을 배우십시오.

sentences.original_text: Be honest and fair in what you do.
Help people who are in pain.
and children who have no family
